text: @narendramodi @RBI @PiyushGoyal As we need more beds for treatment of patients affected with #COVID19 I would be great if we can use the LHB and ICF coaches of our Trains as hospital beds as they are already equipped with sufficient electricity and other facilities. DEAR FRIENDS TO RETWEET !!
